text: Plachta or Placht is a Slavic-German surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Elias Placht (1690-?), Czech-Austrian violin maker and founder of Cheb Violin Making School * Jindřich Plachta (1899-1951), Czech actor * Johann Baptist Placht, 19th-century Austrian fraudster * Matthias Plachta (born 1991), German ice hockey player * Otto Placht (b. 1962), Czech artist * Richard Placht, designer of the Wound Medal (Austria-Hungary)
title: Plachta
